segments.text: I see the girl standing close to the boy, watching with hopeful eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, eager to receive a cookie, completely focused on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but think about how innocent she seems, yet she’s in on the secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen feels lively with their little antics, yet it's teetering on chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the cabinet doors are wide open, framing the boy’s daring move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He really looks like he might tip over any moment; it makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would just look over her shoulder and see the mess that’s brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
